front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Flame-Propagation Testing of Wire & Cable - Corrigendum 1

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Standardization of cable flame propagation testing is beneficial to cable manufacturers, distributors, and users. Uniform procedures; consistent, repeatable results; and measurable test acceptance criteria are required to allow comparisons among competing products and to allow selection of the correct product for the application.
